page.title: 06SARAH'S DAY IN SCHOOL
page.content: When everyone is in school the bell rings at 9 o'clock. We have register and assembly. We get out our reading books and read, then we do Maths. Now it is playtime, we get our tuck and go out into the playground.I like to play crossroads and chase. Next it's bell.We come in and sit down. Now we sometimes write a story. It is lunch time.We go up to the toilets and wash our hands.Now we come back into the classroom and eat our lunch. I have sandwiches. We have our playtime. Now we have a story and do a project until it is playtime. After play we have Mrs Stout (another teacher) and Mrs Hayes teaches the infants. We have music.School finishes at three o'clock.Then I go home and play.
